name: WeCode KC
description: Bridges the opportunity gap by providing youth from Black and Brown communities with free or low-cost access to high-quality, hands-on technology education. They offer coding, web development, cybersecurity, and game design courses

name: The Enterprise Center of Kansas City (TecKC)
description: A hub for innovation and entrepreneurship, supporting Black entrepreneurs with business development resources and programs. While not exclusively a tech training provider, it fosters an environment for tech businesses and innovation

name: Per Scholas
description: A national tech training nonprofit with campuses in St. Louis and Kansas City, offering tuition-free, rigorous technical training in IT and cybersecurity. They focus on advancing economic equity and have a diverse learner base

name: NPower Missouri
